籤詩版本二:
Kare, ndakarashikirwa tsono yangu muchikepe, asi iye zvino ndichiri kuitsvaga mugungwa.
Kana tsono yepakutanga inowanikwa, zvinotora nguva yakawanda uye kushanda nesimba.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram yakafanana nekutsvaga tsono mugungwa.
Zvose zvinoda kushanda nesimba.
解曰: Fortune ndiyo hwaro hwerombo. Lu ndiye mhodzi yeropafadzo. Tsanangura zvakajeka. Zvinokurudzirwa kungwarira.
籤詩故事一:
◇Huang Xiaozi akatsvaga hama dzake kwezviuru zvemamaira
Huang Juejing aibva kuJianchang. Paakanga ava nemakore mashanu, akafirwa naamai vake nemhaka yehondo. Pashure penguva yakati, akapikira kudenga kuti aizodzokorora magwaro echiBuddha kuti awane amai vake. Ipapo akayambuka rwizi rwaHuaihe akaenda achipemha.Akashinga mhepo nemvura uye akatsungirira matambudziko.Mushure memakore makumi maviri namasere, akasvika paChundian, Liang County, Ruzhou, uko akazowana amai vake ndokudzokera.
聖意: Mumba haukunakirei chenjerai kutsvaga pfuma muite dhiri newanano Liujia inovharisa vanofamba netsoka ichichengeta vanhu muminda makonye emasadza akanaka usafudze zvipfuwo zvinonetsa kuwana vanhu it zvinonetsa kukwidza nyaya.Zvakakodzera kutama.Zvakakodzera kutamisa pfuma yakarasika.Zvakaoma kupora kubva kuzvirwere zvakakomba.Kugara kwenguva pfupi kumakuva emakomo.
古人: Huang Xiaozi akatsvaga hama dzake kwezviuru zvemamaira
